name: open-web-inspector
description: The open source web element inspector - AI-controllable DOM inspection with live CSS editing, hover highlighting, and developer tools integration

scripts.test: echo "Navigate to http://localhost:8002/examples/ to test the functionality" && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:dev && npm run build:prod
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run build
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run build
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run build
scripts.release: npm run build && git add dist/ && git commit -m "ðŸš€ Release build files" && git push
scripts.size: echo "ðŸ“¦ Build sizes:" && ls -lah dist/*.js | awk '{print $5, $9}'

author: Your Name
